about_the_game: This build is a demo version of Spellfolio by Ingvar Valderson. The game is still in development, so some bugs may be present. If you encounter any issues or have ideas on how to improve the game, please visit Spellfolio's Discussions to leave your feedback there.
detailed_description: This build is a demo version of Spellfolio by Ingvar Valderson. The game is still in development, so some bugs may be present. If you encounter any issues or have ideas on how to improve the game, please visit Spellfolio's Discussions to leave your feedback there.
name: Spellfolio Demo
